participant_1.background:
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
My first cup of coffee in the morning is the best part of my day.
i am divorced.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

participant_2.background:
I need to find a way to balance my love of binge watching with my need to focus on my art.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
i am in a lot of debt.
I moved to Los Angeles from Tokyo and my brothers helped me a lot, so I am making lunch for them to show my appreciation.
My family, even if my parents don't always understand me.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Good! I just moved to LA from Tokyo and I am making lunch for my brothers to show my appreciation for helping me.
That is great! I am glad to hear that you are settling in well.
Thank you! I am still getting used to the time difference, but it is not too bad.
I can imagine! I am sure you will adjust quickly.
I hope so! I am excited to start my new job and explore LA.
That is great! I am sure you will do great.
Thank you! I appreciate the encouragement.
You are welcome! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to binge watch TV shows, and I am also a big fan of art.
I love binge watching TV shows too! What are some of your favorites?
I love The Office, Parks and Recreation, and Friends.
Those are all great shows! I love Friends too.
Me too! It is my favorite show of all time.
What kind of art do you like?
I love all kinds of art, but I am especially drawn to abstract paintings.
I love abstract paintings too! They are so creative and expressive.
Me too! I love how they can be interpreted in so many different ways.
I agree! They are so interesting.
I am glad you agree!
